description: Try our easy to follow Breaky Peach Parfait recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Breaky Peach Parfait Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cups crispy oat clusters wild about berries

recipeInstructions.text: Drain peaches well, then transfer to a large paper towel-lined plate to allow to drain further. Divide half of the yoghurt among 4 x 300ml glasses. Divide half of the peaches among glasses, then divide half of the clusters among glasses.
Spoon remaining yoghurt into glasses. Top with remaining peaches and clusters. Serve drizzled with honey.
